meanings: protection, defending, warding off, prevention, damming up, banking up, a charm(부적), a screen(칸막이)
(몹시, 심하게) violently, severely, badly, harshly, wildly, blindly
(물체의 표면을 덮고 있는 얇은 조직) film (of), membrane
